messages.title: 🔥 v1.8.90 is LIVE!
messages.message:
🎉 We've crossed **8,000+ downloads** and processed over **300,000 screenshots** — massive thanks to everyone using and supporting Shots Studio!

Now onto what's new in v1.8.90:

✅ OCR is here — scan text straight from screenshots
🎨 New Amber theme to freshen things up
⚙️ Revamped Advanced Settings

🧪 Want early access to on-device AI and other exciting beta features?
Toggle Beta Mode in the 'Advanced section' to receive pre-release updates.

Huge thanks to the community for helping us level up 🙌

messages.title: 🚀 What's NEW !
messages.message:
Thanks for all your amazing feedback — we've been listening! v1.8.80 brings powerful updates to supercharge your screenshot workflow:

• 🎨 Custom Themes & AMOLED Mode - Tailor the look to match your vibe.
• 📱 Large Screen Optimization - Seamless support for tablets and foldables.
• 📂 Custom Path Support - Load screenshots from any folder of your choice.

⭐ Like the project? Star the repo!
💬 Have feedback or suggestions? Open an issue or start a discussion — we'll get to it ASAP.
